Articles.Content:
Hi there! I'm a long-time lurker (been playing KSP for about four months and lurking the forums for about as long), but I've recently decided to go ahead and make an account and maybe start getting more involved in the community in general.

Anyways, I absolutely adore KSP. Prior to playing the game, science and space hadn't really been of that much interest to me. However, once I got started playing it with my friend, I got really into space in general, and starting learning more and more about NASA and other space programs around the world.

That's about it, really. I've seen a few other players post some pictures of their successes (and, inevitable failures), so I'll go ahead and share a few of mine. I couldn't figure out how to make a spoiler, so they're all kind of in the thread. If anybody could let me know how to fix that, that'd be awesome!

The Luna III, a Mun manned orbiter

The Tiger Probe, my first ever mission to another planet

The Icelander (even though it's probably not ice)

My (finally!) first moon landing

A Duna Probe Lander, of which I can't remember the name

My first ever moon base!

The KSS Enterprise, an Eve manned orbiter, in the middle of aerobraking

Anyways, glad to be here! Sorry about the pictures again, if anybody can tell me how then I'll put them in a spoiler.
i must say that your rockets are epic looking and how the f**k do you dock? i got no patince lol
